(Photo-nuclear waste is produced through certain pro- cesses involving the manufacture of photonic energy through manipulation of multidimensional nuclear materials). This process causes a massive nuclear explosion on D-3 Earth in 2976 AD, through which Earth is destroyed. All souls involved in the cataclysm fragment and are lost within HU-1. Their con- nections to the Sphere of Amenti race morphogenetic field and their personal soul matrices are severed.
